message: Generated 5 comprehensive Cluster B and C personality disorder questions with detailed differential diagnosis scenarios. Questions distinguish: (1) Histrionic vs Narcissistic vs Borderline, (2) Narcissistic vs Antisocial, (3) Avoidant vs Schizoid vs Dependent vs Social Anxiety, (4) Borderline vs Dependent vs Histrionic vs Bipolar II, (5) Dependent vs Avoidant vs Borderline vs GAD. All questions are application-level difficulty with extensive explanations covering why each incorrect option doesn't fit.

key_teaching_points: Histrionic seeks attention theatrically; Narcissistic seeks admiration through grandiosity
Avoidant WANTS relationships but fears rejection; Schizoid doesn't want relationships
Borderline shows splitting and self-harm; Dependent shows submissiveness and caretaking needs
Dependent urgently seeks NEW caretaker; Borderline shows intense emotional instability
NPD exploitation stems from entitlement; ASPD requires conduct disorder history
